revisions.*:
'''Egon Schulte''' (born January 7, 1955 in Heggen (Kreis Olpe), Germany) is a [[mathematician]] and a professor of Mathematics at [[Northeastern University (Boston)|Northeastern University]] in [[Boston]]. He received his Ph.D. in 1980 from [[Dortmund University of Technology|University of Dortmund, Germany]], his doctoral dissertation was on ''Regular Incidence Complexes'' ([[abstract regular polytope]]s).

== Selected publications ==
